content.title: Bring It On: Fight to the Finish (Video 2009)
content.stars: Christina Milian, Vanessa Born, Cody Longo
content.description: Lina Cruz is a tough, sharp-witted Latina cheerleader from East L.A. who transfers to a posh, West Los Angeles high school after her widowed mother remarries a wealthy man and Lina not only...
